message: You must not live in Houston because 5min delay on the freeway can lead to an hour of traffic. You're completely right that bills can wait, however I don't put myself in financial situations. I'd rather use my degree, that I paid for & help sick people get better. What if someone was going into labor? What if someone was rushing to the hospital to spend the last minutes their loved ones have on earth? What if an ambulance got stuck in that traffic? What if a cop was trying to get to a call and stop a robbery? This world runs by people doing their job, not by sitting in traffic that was cause by a non-emergency!
